text: opened in Hirado, Nagasaki Prefecture, Japan, in 1955. The museum is housed in the 1893 Tsurugamine Mansion of the Matsura family, former daimyō of the Hirado Domain. ==See also== * List of Cultural Properties of Japan - paintings (Nagasaki) ==References== ==External links== * Matsura Historical Museum Category:Museums in Nagasaki Prefecture Category:Museums established in 1955 Category:1955 establishments in Japan Category:Hirado, Nagasaki
title: Matsura Historical Museum
